sentences.en: A cat's fur is soft to the touch.
a coat with a fur collar
A fur coat has more utility in winter than in autumn.
sentences.cn: 毛皮外衣在冬天比在秋天更有用.

sentences.en: A fur coat is incongruous with a bathing suit.
sentences.cn: 皮大衣和游泳衣是不相称的.

sentences.en: a pair of leather gloves with fur linings
sentences.cn: 一双毛皮衬里的皮手套
他身穿一件镶毛边的外套。
我喜欢他的毛绒绒的软毛。

sentences.en: In lapping up a fur, they always put the inner side outwards.
sentences.cn: 卷毛皮时, 他们总是让内层朝外.

sentences.en: Its fur is short, dense and silky.
sentences.cn: 它的毛又短又密，柔软光洁。

sentences.en: She was wearing a silver fox fur across her shoulders.
sentences.cn: 她肩上披了一张银狐皮.

sentences.en: The function of a mammal's fur is to insulate the body.
sentences.cn: 哺乳动物皮毛的功能在于使身体保温.

sentences.en: The white fur of the polar bear is a natural camouflage.
sentences.cn: 北极熊身上的白色的浓密软毛是一种天然的伪装.

sentences.en: This creature's fur is short, dense and silky.
sentences.cn: 这种动物的毛又短又密、丝般柔滑。

sentences.en: We were amused to see how assiduously the animal groomed its fur.
sentences.cn: 看着这只动物如此认真地梳理自己的毛，我们被逗乐了。

sentences.en: Wearing fur has become deeply unfashionable.
sentences.cn: 穿毛皮衣物已经相当过时了。

sentences.en: When the organ does appear, however, it is not only impressive in size, but its bright pink color makes it stand out against the dark fur.
sentences.cn: 然而当这个器官出现时，不仅是在尺寸上能让人留下深刻印象，它那淡粉色的颜色更是和黑色的毛皮形成鲜明对比。

sentences.en: Women are also wearing fur again.
sentences.cn: 女性还重新穿起了皮草。
